member.name: D2D1_BUFFER_PRECISION
member.summary: Represents the bit depth of the imaging pipeline in Direct2D.

member.name: D2D1_BUFFER_PRECISION.D2D1_BUFFER_PRECISION_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The buffer precision is not specified.

member.name: D2D1_BUFFER_PRECISION.D2D1_BUFFER_PRECISION_8BPC_UNORM_SRGB
member.summary: Use 8-bit normalized integer standard RGB data per channel.

summary.para: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits.
